metadata.title: Amdesco Men's Never Forget Old Cassette Tape T-Shirt
features: SIZING - *Fit* runs true to size; you should order whatever size you normally wear in a Men's T-shirt. S - 18" x 28" / M - 20" x 29" / L - 22" x 30" / XL - 24" x 31" / 2XL - 26" x 32" / 3XL - 28" x 33" / 4XL - 30" x 34" - Size measurements are approximate due to manufacturing variations.
Shirts are 100% pre-shrunk cotton; Athletic Heather Gray is 90/10 pre-shrunk cotton/polyester blend
All Garments are designed, printed and shipped from the United States.
Machine wash cold inside out; Tumble dry on low heat
Perfect gift for all holidays and occasions; Satisfaction is Guaranteed!
description: Amdesco Men's T-shirts are great for lounging around the house, going out with friends, or perfect as gifts for any occasion. All Amdesco shirts are 100% pre-shrunk cotton (Heather Gray is 90/10 pre-shrunk cotton/polyester blend) and are fully machine washable. Every Amdesco item comes with a 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee, Free Standard Shipping and Free Exchanges. Shop worry free with Amdesco!
